description: exp/template/html: tighten rules on dynamic attr names.

messages.text:
Hello nigeltao@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

http://codereview.appspot.com/5076049/diff/8001/src/pkg/exp/template/html/Makefile
File src/pkg/exp/template/html/Makefile (right):

http://codereview.appspot.com/5076049/diff/8001/src/pkg/exp/template/html/Makefile#newcode18
src/pkg/exp/template/html/Makefile:18: schema.go\
I would have called the file attr.go.

http://codereview.appspot.com/5076049/diff/8001/src/pkg/exp/template/html/schema.go
File src/pkg/exp/template/html/schema.go (right):

http://codereview.appspot.com/5076049/diff/8001/src/pkg/exp/template/html/schema.go#newcode18
src/pkg/exp/template/html/schema.go:18: "accept-charset":     contentTypeUnsafe,
Where is contentTypeUnsafe defined? I don't see an edit to content.go in this CL.

http://codereview.appspot.com/5076049/diff/8001/src/pkg/exp/template/html/Makefile
File src/pkg/exp/template/html/Makefile (right):

http://codereview.appspot.com/5076049/diff/8001/src/pkg/exp/template/html/Makefile#newcode18
src/pkg/exp/template/html/Makefile:18: schema.go\
On 2011/09/22 02:09:00, nigeltao wrote:
> I would have called the file attr.go.

Done.

http://codereview.appspot.com/5076049/diff/8001/src/pkg/exp/template/html/schema.go
File src/pkg/exp/template/html/schema.go (right):

http://codereview.appspot.com/5076049/diff/8001/src/pkg/exp/template/html/schema.go#newcode18
src/pkg/exp/template/html/schema.go:18: "accept-charset":     contentTypeUnsafe,
On 2011/09/22 02:09:00, nigeltao wrote:
> Where is contentTypeUnsafe defined? I don't see an edit to content.go in this
> CL.

Added missing files.  This CL was also missing transition.go from which I removed the set of URL attrs since that info is now present here.

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=8f9a4a1003f9 ***

exp/template/html: tighten rules on dynamic attr names.
